title: Law modifying and complementing Law determining the Responsiblities, Organization and Functioning of the Chancellery for Heroes, National Orders and Decorations of Honour
title_en: Law modifying and complementing Law determining the Responsiblities, Organization and Functioning of the Chancellery for Heroes, National Orders and Decorations of Honour

provisions.title: Article 1 - Appointment
provisions.content: Mr. KAYIHURA MUGANGA Didas is appointed Rwanda Commissioner of the East African Competition Authority in the Ministry of East African Community.

provisions.title: Article 2 - Definitions of terms
provisions.content: For the purpose of this Law, the following have the following meanings: 1° family planning: a way for people to their desired number of children and to unwanted pregnancies, taking into account welfare of the child, mother and family; 2° human reproductive health services: services provided by health facilities, varied centers with staff that have the relevant qualifications and other persons trained by responsible Ministry; 3° human reproductive health: a state of human physical, mental and social well-being matters relating to the reproductive system its functions and processes; 4° incapable person: a child or a person mental disability; 5° child: any person who is under eighteen years old.

provisions.title: Article 3 - Key components
provisions.content: reproductive health of human Key components of human reproductive health the following: 1° safe delivery for the mother and the born; 2° care of the new-born; 3° family planning; 4° prevention and treatment of sexually transmitted infections including HIV/AIDS; 5° prevention and treatment of other infections that are harmful to human reproductive health; 6° prevention and treatment of infertility; 7° prevention of gender-based violence care for victims thereof; 8° raising awareness with the aim attitudinal change.

provisions.title: Article 4 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Order comes into force on the date of its signature. It takes effect as of 29/03/2016. Kigali, on 26/05/2016 (sé) MUREKEZI Anastase Prime Minister (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice/Attorney General Seen and sealed with the Seal of the Republic: (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice/Attorney General CYO KUWA KOPERATIVE «TWORORE PARIKI N’IBIYAGA» gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « KOPETIKAPI » ifite Intara y’Iburasirazuba; » ifite icyicaro i Cyarubare, Umurenge ihawe ubuzimagatozi. » igamije guteza imbere ubworozi iherewe ubuzimagatozi keretse » itegetswe gutangaza iki Cyemezo kitarenze iminsi mirongo itatu (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KUWA TIRIMBERE (KOTEMUIRU) gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « KOTEMUIRU » ifite Intara y’Iburengerazuba; » ifite icyicaro i Rukondo, Umurenge ihawe ubuzimagatozi. » igamije guteza imbere ubuhinzi iherewe ubuzimagatozi keretse » itegetswe gutangaza iki Cyemezo kitarenze iminsi mirongo itatu (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KUWA « COOPERATIVE DE CONSTRUCTION (COOCORWI) gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « NYAMPINGA » ifite Umujyi wa Kigali; » ifite icyicaro i Rukiri I, Umurenge ubuzimagatozi. » igamije guteza imbere ubuhinzi iherewe ubuzimagatozi keretse » itegetswe gutangaza iki Cyemezo kitarenze iminsi mirongo itatu (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KUWA « COOPERATIVE THE POWER (COOPPIRWA) gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « COOPPIRWA » ifite Umujyi wa Kigali; » ifite icyicaro mu Kiyovu, Umurenge ihawe ubuzimagatozi. » igamije gutanga serivisi sonorisation no kwigisha inyuranye n’iyo iherewe ubuzimagatozi ku wa 11 Ukuboza 2014 kivanyweho. » itegetswe gutangaza iki Cyemezo kitarenze iminsi mirongo itatu (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KU WA KOPERATIVE « gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « VUMERA » ifite icyicaro y’Iburengerazuba; icyicaro i Gakoro, Umurenge ubuzimagatozi. guteza imbere ubworozi bw’inka ubuzimagatozi keretse gutangaza iki Cyemezo mu iminsi mirongo itatu (30) ikimara (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KU WA KOPERATIVE « gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « COAPTR » ifite Akarere ka Burera, Intara ifite icyicaro i Rukiko, Akagari Intara y’Amajyaruguru, ihawe ubuzimagatozi. guteza imbere ubuhinzi bw’ibirayi ubuzimagatozi keretse gutangaza iki Cyemezo mu iminsi mirongo itatu (30) ikimara (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KUWA KOPERATIVE Y’ABAHINZI NASHO» (K A U NA) gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « K A U NA » ifite icyicaro ifite icyicaro mu Murenge wa Nasho, igamije guteza imbere ubuhinzi bw’urutoki iherewe ubuzimagatozi keretse gutangaza iki Cyemezo mu iminsi mirongo itatu (30) ikimara (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KUWA 23/08/2011 GIHA UBUZIMAGATOZI NTAKIBANANIRA - BUGARAMA gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe kugeza ryo kuwa 11/06/2008 rishyiraho Ikigo mu ngingo yaryo ya 3, igika cya « KOANTABU » ifite icyicaro mu rwandiko rwe rwakiriwe icyicaro i Nyange, Umurenge wa Bugarama, guteza imbere ubucuruzi bw’ibigori. keretse ibanje kubisaba umunsi cyatangarijweho mu Igazeti (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KUWA KOPERATIVE « gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « IMBONEZA » ifite ka Rutsiro, Intara y’Iburengerazuba; » ifite icyicaro mu Kagari ka Busuku, ihawe ubuzimagatozi. » igamije guteza imbere ubworozi inyuranye n’iyo iherewe ubuzimagatozi » itegetswe gutangaza iki Cyemezo kitarenze iminsi mirongo itatu (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KUWA KOPERATIVE « gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « USALAMA » ifite icyicaro Umujyi wa Kigali; ifite icyicaro i Karambo, Umurenge ubuzimagatozi. igamije guteza imbere ubudozi iherewe ubuzimagatozi keretse itegetswe gutangaza iki Cyemezo iminsi mirongo itatu (30) ikimara (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KUWA « ABISUNGANYE (KAG) gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « KAG » ifite icyicaro Umujyi wa Kigali; i Gikomero, Umurenge wa guteza imbere ubworozi bw’ihene ubuzimagatozi keretse gutangaza iki Cyemezo mu Igazeti mirongo itatu (30) ikimara kugihabwa. (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KU WA « COOPERATIVE DE DE SOUDURE POUR L’AGAKIRIRO (COPROMESOANGO) gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « COPROMESOANGO ka Ngororero, Intara y’Iburengerazuba; » ifite icyicaro i Rususa, ihawe ubuzimagatozi. » igamije guteza indi mirimo inyuranye n’iyo iherewe » itegetswe gutangaza gihe kitarenze iminsi mirongo itatu (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KUWA 02/08/2010 GIHA UBUZIMA RUSANGE/ COMMUNITY « COHEFACO » gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 Rwanda, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi cya 3; ryo kuwa 11/06/2008 rishyiraho mu ngingo yaryo ya 3, igika « COHEFACO » ifite icyicaro Intara y’Iburengerazuba, mu rwandiko icyicaro i Nyange, Umurenge ihawe ubuzimagatozi. guteza imbere ubucuruzi bw’ibigori. ubuzimagatozi keretse ibanje umunsi cyatangarijweho mu (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KU WA DEVELOPMENT (SDC) gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « SDC » ifite icyicaro Intara y’Amajyaruguru; i Bugarama, Umurenge wa ubuzimagatozi. guteza imbere ubucuruzi bw’imyaka ubuzimagatozi keretse gutangaza iki Cyemezo mu Igazeti mirongo itatu (30) ikimara kugihabwa. (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KU WA KOPERATIVE « DUHARANIRE NYABIHU» (KODANY) gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « KODANY » ifite ka Nyabihu, Intara y’Iburengerazuba; icyicaro mu Kagari ka Kora, ihawe ubuzimagatozi. igamije gutanga serivisi zijyanye inyuranye n’iyo iherewe ubuzimagatozi gutangaza iki Cyemezo mu iminsi mirongo itatu (30) ikimara (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KUWA SUGARCANE FARMERS » (SUFACOMA) gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « SUFACOMA » ifite Umujyi wa Kigali; » ifite icyicaro i Runzenze, Umurenge ihawe ubuzimagatozi. » igamije guteza imbere ubuhinzi iherewe ubuzimagatozi keretse » itegetswe gutangaza iki Cyemezo kitarenze iminsi mirongo itatu (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative CYO KUWA « COOPERATIVE CHARGED CENTRE » (CCHMC) gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative; ryo kuwa 18 Nzeri 2007 rigena ishyirwaho, nk’uko ryahinduwe kandi ryujujwe ryo kuwa 28/06/2013 rishyiraho cyane cyane mu ngingo yaryo ya « CCHMC » ifite icyicaro Intara y’Amajyepfo; icyicaro i Gashwati, Umurenge ihawe ubuzimagatozi. gukora imirimo ijyanye n’isuku isuku mu isoko rya Mushubi) ubuzimagatozi keretse gutangaza iki Cyemezo mu iminsi mirongo itatu (30) ikimara (Sé) MUGABO Damien gishinzwe guteza imbere Amakoperative

provisions.title: Article 5 - Equal rights to human reproductive
provisions.content: health All persons have equal rights in relation to human reproductive health. No person shall be denied such rights based on form of discrimination.

provisions.title: Article 6 - Right of a pregnant woman, a woman
provisions.content: who has given birth and the new-born A pregnant woman, a woman who has given and a new-born have the right to be cared for to ensure their well being.

provisions.title: Article 7 - Right to decide
provisions.content: Subject to provisions of other laws, every person having attained the majority age has the right decide for oneself in relation to human reproductive health issues.

provisions.title: Article 8 - Right of access to education
provisions.content: medical services Every person has the right of access to education medical services related to human reproductive health.

provisions.title: Article 9 - Right not to be subjected to any
provisions.content: likely to be harmful to human reproductive health Every person has the right not to be subjected to experiment or any other act likely to be harmful human reproductive health.

provisions.title: Article 10 - Right in terms of HIV/AIDS testing
provisions.content: Every person has the right to voluntarily undergo HIV/AIDS test and have his/her results in secret. No person shall undergo unconsented HIV/AIDS testing. However, mandatory testing may required upon request by competent organs accordance with law. A medical doctor or any other health professional may, if necessary, perform HIV/AIDS testing incapable person subject to consent by that person’s biological parent, guardian or caretaker.

provisions.chapter: CHAPTER III: OBLIGATIONS RELATING | Section One: Obligations of individuals
provisions.title: Article 11 - HIV/AIDS infected person’s right
provisions.content: services and medical care An HIV/AIDS infected person has the right services and necessary medical care consonant his/her disease conditions and taking into account the national financial capability. TO HUMAN REPRODUCTIVE HEALTH

provisions.chapter: CHAPTER III: OBLIGATIONS RELATING | Section One: Obligations of individuals
provisions.title: Article 12 - Avoidance of any harm against
provisions.content: human reproductive health and that of the others Regarding human reproductive health, every person has the obligation to: 1º avoid anything that can harm his/her personal reproductive health, that of his/her family and that of others; 2º take care of a pregnant woman, a woman who has recently given birth and a born; 3º protect and safeguard human reproductive health of an elderly person, a person disability or a person incapable of making his/her own decision.

provisions.chapter: CHAPTER III: OBLIGATIONS RELATING | Section One: Obligations of individuals
provisions.title: Article 13 - Self-protection and protection
provisions.content: others against sexually transmitted diseases Every person has the obligation to protect himself/herself and protect others against sexually transmitted diseases. Any discrimination or stigmatization against person infected with HIV/AIDS is prohibited.

provisions.chapter: CHAPTER III: OBLIGATIONS RELATING | Section One: Obligations of individuals | Section 2: Obligations of the Government, public
provisions.title: Article 14 - Discussion with children about
provisions.content: human reproductive health Every biological parent or guardian has the duty discuss with the children about human reproductive health. institutions, other institutions in charge human reproductive health and partners

provisions.chapter: CHAPTER III: OBLIGATIONS RELATING | Section One: Obligations of individuals | Section 2: Obligations of the Government, public
provisions.title: Article 15 - Obligations of the Government
provisions.content: promote human reproductive health In order to promote human reproductive health, Government has the following obligations: 1º to establish a human reproductive health policy; 2º to coordinate all activities relating to human reproductive health; 3º to establish a specific unit in charge of human reproductive health in each hospital health centre with medicines, equipment other means necessary to fulfil its mission; 4º to sensitize and assist pregnant women deliver at health facilities and play their in taking decisions on human reproductive health; 5º to help destitute persons and incapable persons have access to human reproductive health services; 6º to train on a regular basis health professionals, community health workers, teachers, authorities of decentralized administrative entities, the private sector the youth on human reproductive health 7º to sensitize all employer institutions encourage their staff to know about human reproductive health; 8º to build partnerships with the private sector in activities related to human reproductive health and monitor their implementation other partners; 9º to conduct and publish research on human reproductive health; 10º to perform any other activity that promote human reproductive health.

provisions.chapter: CHAPTER III: OBLIGATIONS RELATING | Section One: Obligations of individuals | Section 2: Obligations of the Government, public
provisions.title: Article 16 - Care for a pregnant woman, a woman
provisions.content: giving birth, a woman who has given birth and new-born The Government, public institutions and institutions providing human reproductive health services have the obligation to take care pregnant woman, a woman giving birth, a woman who has given birth and a new-born.

provisions.chapter: CHAPTER III: OBLIGATIONS RELATING | Section One: Obligations of individuals | Section 2: Obligations of the Government, public
provisions.title: Article 17 - Providing necessary medicines
provisions.content: health services closer to those in need thereof The Government, public institutions and institutions in charge of human reproductive health have the obligation to provide necessary medicines and health services close to any person in thereof for him/her to have good reproductive health.

provisions.chapter: CHAPTER III: OBLIGATIONS RELATING | Section One: Obligations of individuals | Section 2: Obligations of the Government, public
provisions.title: Article 18 - Provision of good services related
provisions.content: human reproductive health Public servants, the staff of public institutions other institutions providing services related human reproductive health are required to provide good customer care and give to clients fast and quality service without any discrimination.

provisions.chapter: CHAPTER III: OBLIGATIONS RELATING | Section One: Obligations of individuals | Section 2: Obligations of the Government, public
provisions.title: Article 19 - Education in schools regarding
provisions.content: human reproductive health The educational curricula of different categories schools and literacy centres must provide courses human reproductive health. An Order of the Minister in charge of education determines modalities for the implementation provisions of this article.

provisions.title: Article 20 - Public awareness about family
provisions.content: planning The Government, public institutions, institutions charge of human reproductive health and partners have the following obligations: 1º raising public awareness on the adoption family planning and bringing close to people all the necessary materials enabling them to make it for their welfare; 2º sensitizing spouses to have common understanding for their cooperation agreement in relation to family planning; 3º raising youth awareness on family planning. FINAL PROVISIONS

provisions.title: Article 21 - Repealing provision
provisions.content: All prior legal provisions contrary to this Law repealed.

provisions.title: Article 22 - Drafting, consideration and adoption
provisions.content: of this Law This Law was drafted, considered and adopted Kinyarwanda.

provisions.title: Article 23 - Commencement
provisions.content: This Law comes into force on the date of publication in the Official Gazette of the Republic of Rwanda. Kigali, on 20/05/2016 (sé) KAGAME Paul President of the Republic (sé) MUREKEZI Anastase Prime Minister Seen and sealed with the Seal of the Republic: (sé) BUSINGYE Johnston Minister of Justice/Attorney General PRIME MINISTER’S ORDER N˚132/03 OF 26/05/2016 APPOINTING A COMMISSIONER TABLE OF CONTENTS

definitions.definition: services provided by health facilities, varied centers with staff that have the relevant qualifications and other persons trained by responsible Ministry
a state of human physical, mental and social well-being matters relating to the reproductive system its functions and processes
a child or a person mental disability
any person who is under eighteen years old
